Possible negative effects of untreated mental health conditions: 
• Pre-c onception – increased risk of non-adherence to treatment or contraception, unwanted or unintended
pregnancy
• Pregnancy – preterm labour, intrauterine growth restriction hypertension, pre-eclampsia, gestational diabetes
• Newborn – low birthweight babies; premature birth, severe disorders associated with increased neonatal
morbidity, problems with bonding and
